org.restlet.component
Interface RestletServer

All Superinterfaces:
Component, Element, OriginServer, UniformInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRestletServer
public interface RestletServer
extends OriginServer

Origin server composed of restlets containers. Each container is managing a resources namespace.

Method Summary
 RestletContainer addContainer(String name, RestletContainer container)
          Adds a restlet container.
 RestletContainer getDefaultContainer()
          Returns the default container handling direct calls to the server.
 void removeContainer(String name)
          Removes a restlet container.
 void setDefaultContainer(RestletContainer container)
          Sets the default container handling direct calls to the server.

Method Detail

addContainer

RestletContainer addContainer(String name,
                              RestletContainer container)
Adds a restlet container.

Parameters:

Returns:
The added container.
